.. _`pathview`:

PATHVIEW
========

Perform pathway enrichment





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_enrich_heatplot:
        input:
            genelist = "geneList.RDS"
        output:
            png = "pathview.png"
        params:
            pathway_id = "hsa04110"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/clusterProfiler/pathview"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Use clusterProfiler's GeneList to produce the correct geneList object

Parameters:
  * extra: Extra parameters for pathview, besides "gene.data"




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
